rules: Rule1: If user1 has a license for artwork1, then download is allowed for user1 on artwork1.
Rule2: Either the current month is an active license period or the current month is a grace license period.

Rule3: Under the condition that the current month is a grace license period, if artwork1 is available for licensing, then user1 has a premium subscription or, in the event that user1 requests a license for artwork1, user1 holds a license for artwork1.
Rule4: If platform1 is undergoing maintenance, then platform1 is offline.

Rule5: Either platform1 is undergoing maintenance or, if it is not the case that when the current month is an active license period then if artwork1 is available for licensing, user1 has a premium subscription or, provided that user1 requests a license for artwork1, user1 holds a license for artwork1, then user1's license is not suspended.
Rule6: Provided that artwork1 is a featured artwork, it has been approved by a curator.
Rule7: If artwork1 is a featured artwork, then it is available for licensing.
Rule8: Either artwork1 is a featured artwork or artwork1 is a trending artwork.
Rule9: In the event that artwork1 is a trending artwork, then user1 has a premium subscription or, whenever user1 requests a license for artwork1, user1 holds a license for artwork1.
Rule10: If artwork1 has been approved by a curator, then it has high resolution.
Rule11: Whenever artwork1 has complete metadata, then user1 has a premium subscription or, in cases where user1 requests a license for artwork1, user1 holds a license for artwork1.
Rule12: If artwork1 has high resolution, then it has complete metadata.

Rule13: If it is not the case that when the current month is an active license period then if artwork1 is available for licensing, user1 has a premium subscription or, provided that user1 requests a license for artwork1, user1 holds a license for artwork1, then user1's license is suspended.
facts: Fact1: User1 has requested a license for artwork1.
Fact3: User1 does not have a premium subscription.

question: Download is allowed for user1 on artwork1.
